title: JavaScript Currying Techniques
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the concept of currying in JavaScript. Currying is a technique that allows us to transform a function that takes multiple arguments into a sequence of functions that each take a single argument. Through this lab, you will gain a deeper understanding of how currying works and how it can be applied in your JavaScript code.

meta.title: Mastering Currying Techniques in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the power of currying in JavaScript and learn how to transform multi-argument functions into a sequence of single-argument functions.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, coding, javascript lab, currying, javascript tutor, functional programming

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: JavaScript 柯里化技术
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索 JavaScript 中的柯里化概念。柯里化是一种技术，它使我们能够将一个接受多个参数的函数转换为一系列每个只接受一个参数的函数。通过本实验，你将更深入地理解柯里化的工作原理以及它如何应用于你的 JavaScript 代码。

meta.title: 精通 JavaScript 中的柯里化技术
meta.description: 探索 JavaScript 中柯里化的强大功能，并学习如何将多参数函数转换为一系列单参数函数。
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript 练习, 在线 javascript 练习, 编程教程, 编码, javascript 实验, 柯里化, javascript 教程, 函数式编程

verify.name: 验证 Node 命令用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH 中，通过输入 'node' 并按下回车键即可运行 JavaScript。
